column4: Tourism;Â The headquarters of the General Secretariat of the National Committee for Maritime Security rescued a foreign tourist from Koh Rong late on the night of 9th of February
column5: 2019.------The 19-year-old Israeli woman  Eynat Ofir  was suffering from a serious illness and had no means of transportation to Sihanoukville hospital.------According to a statement from the headquarters of the General Secretariat of the National Committee for Maritime Security
column6: a speedboat was dispatched to Koh Rong port
column7: which returned with the tourist to theautonomous port Sihanoukville
column8: where she was taken Sihanoukville Referral Hospital.------The Israeli tourist is now recovering
column9: thanks to the swift action from the navy. ------DAP
